name: PLEASE TOUCH THE F****** CORNER
description:
Controls

W: foward

S: back

A:left

D:right

you know when you leave your TV on for too long and that thing just bounces around the screen and never touches any corners ye well now you can stop that or you can try anyway :)

also feel free to drop me a donation it would be highly appreciated and may even motivate me to make more complex games.

if you want to discuss the game feel free to join my discord server at https://discord.gg/eG3UnVz i will be on and checking it on Mondays so if you want talk with me one on one i will be doing that.
